thread.title: Washington, D.C., group requests that Utah football coaches stop teaching religion classes
thread.title_full: Washington, D.C., group requests that Utah football coaches stop teaching religion classes | Deseret News

author: Amy Donaldson
title: Washington, D.C., group requests that Utah football coaches stop teaching religion classes
text:
Americans United for the Separation of Church and State, a Washington, D.C.-based organization, sent a letter to University of Utah President David W. Pershing requesting that football coaches stop teaching religion classes to players.
More Coverage Utah Utes coaches tailor weekly religion class for LDS football players
